alert.note: Alert for Delta; Lamar (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 18 at 3:29AM CDT until June 18 at 4:15AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Delta County in north central Texas... Southern Lamar County in north central Texas... * Until 415 AM CDT. * At 329 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Paris, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is possible. * Locations impacted include... Paris, Cooper, Blossom, Roxton, Big Creek Lake, Pattonville, Lake Crook, Klondike, Deport, Toco, Sun Valley, Glory, Pacio, Minter, Taylor Town, Cunningham, Atlas, Broadway Junction, Howland and Biardstown. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
